store/privacy-policy-content: I consent to the processing of my personal data to allow Whirlpool UK Appliances Ltd to send me newsletters/marketing communications (in electronic and non-electronic form, including via telephone, postal services, e-mail, SMS, push notifications or banners on third party sites including on Meta and Google platforms) regarding products and services of Whirlpool UK Appliances Ltd even bought or registered by me, as well as to conduct market research.
